title: Ticket #1180: Unify versions of new ClassAds
description:
Condor currently uses two versions of new ClassAds to build. The "core" bits of Condor use the version in /src/classad. External parts (GAHPs) use an external version of new ClassAds. The external version tends to lag the official version, and that we use two different versions is just silly. We should use one.

The most obvious solution is to move new ClassAds into their own Git repository and make them a "real" external, always used.
